scripts.build: mkdir -p django_app/core/static/govuk && sass node_modules/govuk-frontend/dist/govuk/all.scss django_app/core/static/govuk/govuk.css && cp -r node_modules/govuk-frontend/dist/govuk/assets/fonts django_app/core/static/govuk && cp -r node_modules/govuk-frontend/dist/govuk/assets/images django_app/core/static/govuk && cp node_modules/govuk-frontend/dist/govuk/assets/manifest.json django_app/core/static/govuk && esbuild django_app/core/static/core/javascript/main.js --bundle --outfile=django_app/core/static/govuk/govuk.js
